english.default: He plays and He enjoys; He is the Inner-knower, the Searcher of hearts.

default.akhar: auh sB dy idl dI jwxn vwlw Awp jgq-Kyf Kyfdw hY qy (ies ƒ vyK ky) ^uS huMdw hY[
